# Word Count
## Objective
Write a Python program that reads a text file and tells the user how many times a specific keyword appears in it.
## Instructions
1. Prompt the user for: - A filename (e.g., `sample.txt`) - A keyword to search for 2. Read the contents of the file. 3. Count how many times the keyword appears in the file **(case-insensitive)**. 4. Print the result.
### Bonus (Optional)
- Handle the case where the file does not exist. - Strip punctuation from words when comparing. - Highlight each occurrence of the word in context.
## Sample Run
``` Enter the filename: sample.txt Enter the keyword: fox The word "fox" appears 3 times in sample.txt. ```
